Rooms of Realities offers unique and well-balanced puzzles to solve alone or with friends! Enter the mysterious levels full of logic, mechanics, precision, memory, cooperation, cipher, and skill-based challenges! And donâ€™t worry if you get stuck - our smart, yet non-invasive hint system will help you get back on track.

ğŸ” Play solo or with your friends! ğŸ”
The game offers both co-op and single-player modes. Solve all the puzzles by yourself or play with your friends! Work together, help each other and, whatâ€™s most important, communicate to finish the adventures.

ğŸ”Play 9 different chapters in 3 unique scenarios! ğŸ”
The game now offers 9 chapters full of puzzles set in 3 different scenarios: an ancient pyramid, an underwater station, and even an asylum. Each environment holds its own story and 3 atmospheric chapters to play. 

ğŸ”Get all the collectibles and take a photo in the victory room! ğŸ”
Gather collectibles, win a trophy for completing each scenario, and after all that hard work take a photo with your friends in our victory rooms! These special sceneries will let you save all the best memories in one click.
